metadata.title: CVE-2020-10001 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An input validation issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in macOS Big Sur 11.1, Security Update 2020-001 Catalina,Security Update 2020-007 Mojave. A malicious application may be able toread restricted memory.

criterions.comment: cups: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
